{"id":491917888,"lang":"java","time":"9 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1620769396,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/491917888/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"38.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String reverseVowels(String s) {\n        int start = 0, end = s.length() - 1;\n        char[] chars = s.toCharArray();\n        while (start < end) {\n            while (start<end && !isVowel(chars[start])) start++;\n            while (start<end && !isVowel(chars[end])) end--;\n            char temp = chars[start];\n            chars[start] = chars[end];\n            chars[end] = temp;\n            start++;\n            end--;\n        }\n        return String.valueOf(chars);\n    }\n    \n    private boolean isVowel(char c) {\n        return c == 'a' || c == 'e' || c == 'i' || c == 'o' || c == 'u' ||\n           c =='A' || c == 'E' || c == 'I'  || c == 'O' || c == 'U';\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string"}
